p: The catalytic dyad of M pro is located in a cleft between domains I and II ( Fig.Â 4b). 23, 71 Despite the minor mutation S46A in close proximity, the active sites of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 M pro are highly conserved. The influence of the S46A mutation on shape, size, flexibility and plasticity of the active site and its relevance for inhibitor design is under debate. 87, 88
